file.title: Open Excel

p.text: command opens a database format Excel , and displays the specified table from the database. This save after changing the table to Excel no longer available. Also, know that only opens Excel 8.0 . If your Excel spreadsheet does not open the program, use this: Projects \ Examples \ Complex projects \ Table 2 \ Base Excel.xls
